operation.description: Load in Arnim's annotations from Picasa.
operation.name: runAnnotationImport

parameter.description: Path to annotations file which annotates fly specimens with a list of annotations (e.g. "/groups/jacs/jacsShare/PipelineInputFiles/SplitPicking/annotations.txt")
parameter.name: annotationsPath

parameter.description: Name of the ontology to use, or create if it doesn't exist (e.g. "Picasa Imported Ontology")
parameter.name: ontologyName

operation.description: Load in the screen intensity and distribution scores as annotations, and create a folder structure to organize them.
operation.name: runScreenScoresLoading

parameter.description: Full path of accepts file to read from (e.g. "/groups/jacs/jacsShare/PipelineInputFiles/ScreenEvaluation/finalAccepts.txt")
parameter.name: acceptsPath

parameter.description: Full path of file to write to (e.g. "/groups/jacs/jacsShare/PipelineInputFiles/ScreenEvaluation/loaded.txt")
parameter.name: loadedFile

operation.description: Export the screen intensity and distribution scores.
operation.name: runScreenScoresExport

parameter.description: Full path for the output file (e.g. "/groups/jacs/jacsShare/rokickiTest/scoreExport.txt")
parameter.name: outputFilepath

operation.description: Load in Arnim's representatives and split constructs spreadsheets and combine them with the screen data into a new hierarchy for split line representative determination.
operation.name: runSplitLinesLoading

parameter.description: Name of top level folder for split lines (e.g. "FlyLight Screen Split Constructs")
parameter.name: topLevelFolderName

parameter.description: Path to representatives file which picks a representative specimen for each flyline (e.g. "/groups/jacs/jacsShare/PipelineInputFiles/SplitPicking/representatives.txt")
parameter.name: representativesPath

parameter.description: Path to split constructs file which annotates flylines with an AD or DBD designation (e.g. "/groups/jacs/jacsShare/PipelineInputFiles/SplitPicking/splitReps.txt")
parameter.name: splitConstructsPath

operation.description: Synchronize Neo4j to the database
operation.name: runNeo4jSync

operation.description: Synchronize the MongoDb to the database
operation.name: runMongoDbSync

operation.description: Synchronize the SOLR indexes to the database
operation.name: runSolrIndexSync

operation.description: Trigger SOLR indexing for every entity in a given tree
operation.name: runSolrTreeIndexing

parameter.description: Entity id of the root of the tree
parameter.name: rootId

operation.description: Run all orphan checker services for all subjects
operation.name: runOrphanCheckerServices

parameter.description: Should we delete the orphans that we find?
parameter.name: deleteOrphans

operation.description: Check for orphan annotations, and possibly delete them.
operation.name: runOrphanEntityCheckerService

parameter.description: Should we delete orphaned entity trees?
parameter.name: deleteOrphanTrees

operation.description: Check for orphan annotations, and possibly delete them.
operation.name: runOrphanAnnotationCheckerService

parameter.description: Should we delete annotations which have nonexistent targets?
parameter.name: deleteAnnotationsMissingTargets

parameter.description: Should we delete annotations which have nonexistent ontology terms?
parameter.name: deleteAnnotationsMissingTerms

operation.description: Upgrade the entire data model to use the most current entity structure.
operation.name: runUpgradeData

operation.description: Upgrade the given user's data model to use the most current entity structure.
operation.name: runUpgradeUserData

operation.description: Upgrade the given sample to the current entity structure. In this release, the sample id is ignored, and the method is equivalent to runUpgradeUserData.
operation.name: runUpgradeSingleSample

parameter.description: Entity id of the sample to run (e.g. "1679282451010027618")
parameter.name: sampleEntityId

operation.description: Change the owner of the entity tree rooted at the given entity.
operation.name: annexEntityTree

parameter.description: Subject key of the new owner (e.g. "user:saffordt")
parameter.name: subjectKey

operation.description: Run the FlyScreen Pipeline
operation.name: runFlyScreenPipeline

parameter.description: Re-run the Samples that already have results?
parameter.name: refresh

operation.description: Run the FlyScreen Pattern Annotation Pipeline
operation.name: runFlyScreenPatternAnnotationPipeline

parameter.description: Re-run the Samples that already have results?
parameter.name: refresh

operation.description: Perform custom surgery on Screen Pipeline results, by user
operation.name: performScreenPipelineSurgery

operation.description: Run the File Tree Loader Pipeline
operation.name: runFileTreeLoaderPipeline

parameter.description: Root directory path of tree to import
parameter.name: rootDirectoryPath

parameter.description: Name for top-level folder in Workstation
parameter.name: topLevelFolderName

operation.description: Load Mask-Channel Compartment Files to DB Entities
operation.name: runCompartmentLoading

parameter.description: Name to give the compartment set (e.g. "Unified 20x Alignment Space" or "Yoshi 63x Subsampled Alignment Space").
parameter.name: alignmentSpaceName

parameter.description: Directory path of compartment mask-channel files to import (e.g. /nrs/jacs/jacsData/filestore/MaskResources/Compartment/A_DIRECTORY_CONTAINING_MASK_CHAN_DATA).
parameter.name: maskChanPath

parameter.description: Name for top-level folder in Workstation (e.g., /compartmentMaskChan1024x512x218 or /compartmentMaskChan1712x1370x492).
parameter.name: topLevelFolderName

operation.description: createPatternAnnotationQuantifierSummaryFile
operation.name: createPatternAnnotationQuantifierSummaryFile

operation.description: Run the Transcription Imaging Consortium Pipeline
operation.name: runTicPipeline

operation.description: Create Mask Summary File
operation.name: createMaskSummaryFile

operation.description: Run the Mask Annotation Pipeline
operation.name: runMaskAnnotationPipeline

parameter.description: Re-run the Samples that already have results?
parameter.name: refresh

operation.description: Run the Mask Guide Service
operation.name: runMaskGuideService

operation.description: Run the Neuron Merge Service
operation.name: runNeuronMergeTest

parameter.description: Comma Separated List of Neuron Fragments
parameter.name: commaSeparatedNeuronFragmentList

operation.description: Slow Import Service
operation.name: runSlowImportTask

operation.description: Run the ArnimPatternAnnotationFinisher
operation.name: runArnimPatternAnnotationFinisher

operation.description: DeDuper
operation.name: runDataDeDuplication

operation.description: Add Sample Folders to 3D Tile Microscope Samples
operation.name: create3DTileMicroscopeSamples

operation.description: Add a child Folder to an Entity
operation.name: addChildFolder

parameter.description: Entity id of the parent entity
parameter.name: parentId

operation.description: Run some canned benchmarks
operation.name: runBenchmarks

operation.description: Run Scality benchmarks
operation.name: runScalityBenchmarks

parameter.description: Entity id to find files for benchmarking
parameter.name: entityId

operation.description: Run cleanup for nerna retired data
operation.name: runNernaRetiredDataCleanup

operation.description: Run Database File Verification Service
operation.name: runFileVerification
